meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves San Dimas - Apartments in San Dimas, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Welcome to eaves San Dimas Canyon, a place where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality San Dimas apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, TV package, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. Residents enjoy access to our outdoor pool and spa, and our fitness center. Located on S. San Dimas Canyon Road in the prestigious Bonita Unified School District, our Los Angeles apartment community is conveniently located within easy access of the 210, 10 and 57 freeways, along with the Metrolink line, and offers convenient access to an array of shopping, dining and recreation. San Dimas is a hot destination for foodies as there is an abundance of good restaurants like Lucky Elephant Thai Cuisine, Pozzetto Italian Dining and The Bagelry. If it's entertainment that you’re looking for, you will enjoy visiting Raging Waters, Pioneer Waterland and the Pacific Railroad Society. Simply put, our San Dimas apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for?

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Living at eaves San Dimas Canyon
div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions. View more details

div.p: Moving can be stressful, but we’re here to welcome you home. Connect with one of our team members to learn more.

There are 4 spaces available near the spa & 5 spaces near the gym. Future resident parking spaces can also be utilized as guest parking after business hours. better than you expected.","description":"Welcome to eaves San Dimas Canyon, a place where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality San Dimas apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, TV package, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. Residents enjoy access to our outdoor pool and spa, and our fitness center. Located on S. San Dimas Canyon Road in the prestigious Bonita Unified School District, our Los Angeles apartment community is conveniently located within easy access of the 210, 10 and 57 freeways, along with the Metrolink line, and offers convenient access to an array of shopping, dining and recreation. San Dimas is a hot destination for foodies as there is an abundance of good restaurants like Lucky Elephant Thai Cuisine, Pozzetto Italian Dining and The Bagelry. If it's entertainment that you’re looking for, you will enjoy visiting Raging Waters, Pioneer Waterland and the Pacific Railroad Society. Simply put, our San Dimas apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for.
